alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:25PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ontonagon County through 1000 PM EDT... At 924 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Porcupine Mountains State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Porcupine Mountains State Park, Rockland, Silver City, Norwich, White Pine and Victoria Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
